reviewText: It was exactly as advertised, arrived in the estimated time.

you get to watch this guy put on small pieces of clay for 45 minutes.  Yes he has some great sculpting techniques, but it takes so long to get to them, it's crazy.  Should have cut away and come back.

I was also expecting this to show how to prep, pour and cast the finished sculptures in latex, to create masks.
I have learned so much with the DVDS. I LOVE this line of DVDs. This guy is a master!
it was a gift. It seems to be as advertise. The person given too had a good time with this product.
I love this dvd this msn is so talented ilearned allot from this video thanx Mark Alfrey I will be buying more videos
This is a great in depth video on home monster making and molding, starters would love to have this. I learned alot from it.

This is a great video for visual learners, he doesn't hold your hand all the way through but with sculpting, the best way to learn is to see someone do it. If you watch and attempt these techniques on your own it will be very informative and worth the money.  He's a great sculptor and some of the tools he uses to achieve realism is pretty ingenious.

I bought this DVD thinking it would help me learn to sculpt, but all I learned is that the author can sculpt, and he shows off his talent.  He's amazing, don't get me wrong, but if you're looking to learn how to sculpt, there's not much this DVD has to offer in my opinion.
